metadata.title: CVE-2018-16981 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: stb stb_image.h 2.19, as used in catimg, Emscripten, and other products,has a heap-based buffer overflow in the stbi__out_gif_code function.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
love package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mame package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
retroarch package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
zam-plugins package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.

libsfml package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
goxel package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
catimg package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
